titleInfo.title: DETAINED in the Parish jail of Avoyelles

mods.abstract: DETAINED in the Parish jail of Avoyelles the runaway negro man, ALFRED. He says he belongs to Henry Hertzog of the Parish of Natchitoches. Said slave is 23 years old and is 5 feet 6 inches high. The owner is hereby duly notified to claim his property according to law. Parish of Avoyelles Parish of Avoyelles January 10th 1863. DORA GUILLOT. JAILOR.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
